name: responseBodyV2DecodedPayload
desc: A decoded payload containing the version 2 notification data.

items.name: notificationType
items.desc: The in-app purchase event for which the App Store sent this version 2 notification.

items.name: subtype
items.desc: Additional information that identifies the notification event, or an empty string. The subtype applies only to select version 2 notifications.

items.name: notificationUUID
items.desc: A unique identifier for the notification. Use this value to identify a duplicate notification.

items.name: notificationVersion
items.desc: The version number of the notification.

items.name: data
items.desc: The object that contains the app metadata and signed renewal and transaction information.
